mapper.select: SELECT APP_PROTO as appProto,PROTO as proto,SRC_IP as srcIp,DST_IP as dstIp,DURATION as duration,FRONT_RATE as frontRate,BACK_RATE as backRate,BYTE_COUNT as byteCount FROM ${segment} WHERE TIMESTAMP = (SELECT MAX(TIMESTAMP ) FROM ${segment}) LIMIT 6
SELECT SRC_IP as source, DST_IP as target, BYTE_COUNT as value FROM ${segment} ORDER BY BYTE_COUNT DESC LIMIT 10
